statements: SELECT * FROM Marine_Debris_Clean_Up_Efforts;
SELECT location, frequency FROM Marine_Debris_Clean_Up_Efforts;
SELECT * FROM Marine_Debris_Clean_Up_Efforts WHERE clean_up_id = 1;
SELECT location FROM Marine_Debris_Clean_Up_Efforts WHERE frequency > 10;
SELECT * FROM Marine_Debris_Clean_Up_Efforts ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM Marine_Debris_Clean_Up_Efforts WHERE clean_up_id = 1;
SELECT location, frequency FROM Marine_Debris_Clean_Up_Efforts WHERE frequency > 5 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT clean_up_id, location, frequency FROM Marine_Debris_Clean_Up_Efforts WHERE location LIKE '%beach%' ORDER BY frequency ASC;
SELECT AVG(frequency) AS avg_frequency FROM Marine_Debris_Clean_Up_Efforts;
SELECT * FROM Marine_Debris_Clean_Up_Efforts WHERE frequency BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY clean_up_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM clean_up_efforts WHERE location = 'Beach'
SELECT location, frequency FROM clean_up_efforts WHERE date = '2021-07-15'
SELECT id, location, date FROM clean_up_efforts WHERE frequency > 3
SELECT * FROM debris_types WHERE type_name = 'Plastic Bottles'
SELECT type_name, description FROM debris_types
SELECT * FROM clean_up_efforts WHERE location = 'Beach'
SELECT id, debris_type FROM clean_up_efforts WHERE date = '2023-06-15'
SELECT id, location, date FROM clean_up_efforts WHERE frequency > 5 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT c.location, d.type_name, c.frequency FROM clean_up_efforts c INNER JOIN debris_types d ON c.debris_type = d.id ORDER BY c.frequency DESC
SELECT c.location, d.type_name, c.date FROM clean_up_efforts c INNER JOIN debris_types d ON c.debris_type = d.id WHERE d.type_name = 'Plastic'
SELECT * FROM clean_up_efforts WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM clean_up_locations WHERE latitude > 40.0;
SELECT organizer, COUNT(*) AS total_cleanups FROM clean_up_efforts GROUP BY organizer;
SELECT debris_category, description FROM debris_types WHERE debris_category = 'Plastic';
SELECT clean_up_id, location_id, date, debris_quantity FROM clean_up_efforts WHERE location_id = 'a1b2c3d4';
SELECT * FROM clean_up_efforts WHERE location_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM clean_up_locations WHERE latitude > 35.0;
SELECT organizer, count(clean_up_id) AS total_clean_ups FROM clean_up_efforts GROUP BY organizer;
SELECT * FROM debris_types WHERE debris_category = 'Plastic' AND description LIKE '%ocean%';

SELECT location_name, debris_category, debris_quantity FROM clean_up_efforts JOIN clean_up_locations ON clean_up_efforts.location_id = clean_up_locations.location_id JOIN debris_types ON clean_up_efforts.debris_type = debris_types.debris_category ORDER BY location_name DESC, debris_quantity ASC;
SELECT id, location, date, debris_type FROM clean_up_efforts;
SELECT * FROM volunteer_records ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT type_name, description FROM debris_types WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM clean_up_logs WHERE debris_collected > 10;
SELECT id, name, email FROM volunteer_records WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM clean_up_efforts WHERE location = 'Park A'
SELECT id, location, date FROM clean_up_efforts WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT c.id, c.location, v.name FROM clean_up_efforts c JOIN volunteer_records v ON c.id = v.id
SELECT d.type_name, d.description, COUNT(l.id) AS total_logs FROM debris_types d LEFT JOIN clean_up_logs l ON d.id = l.clean_up_id GROUP BY d.type_name, d.description
SELECT c.id, c.location, SUM(l.debris_collected) AS total_debris_collected FROM clean_up_efforts c JOIN clean_up_logs l ON c.id = l.clean_up_id GROUP BY c.id, c.location
SELECT * FROM debris_clean_up_efforts;
SELECT location, date FROM debris_clean_up_efforts ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, volunteers FROM debris_clean_up_efforts WHERE volunteers > 10;
SELECT * FROM debris_collection_points WHERE time_spent_hours > 5 ORDER BY time_spent_hours DESC;
SELECT type_name, description FROM debris_types WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM debris_clean_up_efforts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location, date FROM debris_clean_up_efforts WHERE volunteers > 10 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT dcue.location, dt.type_name FROM debris_clean_up_efforts dcue JOIN debris_types dt ON dcue.id = dt.id;
SELECT cr.eam_id, cr.report_date, dcp.trash_collected_kg FROM clean_up_reports cr JOIN debris_collection_points dcp ON cr.id = dcp.eam_id;
SELECT dd.type_name, dcp.time_spent_hours FROM debris_types dd JOIN debris_collection_points dcp ON dd.id = dcp.type_id WHERE dcp.time_spent_hours > 5 ORDER BY dcp.time_spent_hours DESC;
